org.craftercms.search.service

Interface SearchService


  • public interface SearchService
    Provides a basic interface to a search engine, like Solr.
    Author:
    Alfonso VÃ¡squez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String commit()
      Commits any pending changes made to the search engine's index.
      String delete(String site, String id)
      Deletes the search engine's index data of an XML document.
      Map<String,Object> search(Query query)
      Does a full-text search and returns a Map model.

      Updates the search engine's index data of an XML document.

      Updates the search engine's index data of a structured document (PDF, Word, Office).
      String updateDocument(String site, String id, File document, String documentXmlDescriptor)
      Updates the search engine's index data of a structured document (PDF, Word, Office).

    • Method Detail

      • search

        Map<String,Object> search(Query query)
                          throws SearchException
        Does a full-text search and returns a Map model.
        Parameters:
        query - the query object
        Returns:
        search result in a Map data model. The key is the field name and the value is the field single value or multiple values (as a list)
        Throws:
        SearchException - if any error occurs that makes the search fail

      • update

        String update(String site,
            String id,
            String xml,
            boolean ignoreRootInFieldNames)
              throws SearchException
        Updates the search engine's index data of an XML document.
        Parameters:
        site - the Crafter site name the content belongs to
        id - the id of the XML document, within the site
        xml - the XML document to update in the index
        ignoreRootInFieldNames - ignore the root element of the input XML in field names
        Returns:
        a success string
        Throws:
        SearchException

      • delete

        String delete(String site,
            String id)
              throws SearchException
        Deletes the search engine's index data of an XML document.
        Parameters:
        site - the Crafter site name the content belongs to
        id - the id of the content, within the site
        Returns:
        a success string
        Throws:
        SearchException

      • commit

        String commit()
              throws SearchException
        Commits any pending changes made to the search engine's index.
        Returns:
        a success string
        Throws:
        SearchException

      • updateDocument

        String updateDocument(String site,
                    String id,
                    File document)
                      throws SearchException
        Updates the search engine's index data of a structured document (PDF, Word, Office).
        Parameters:
        site - the Crafter site name the content belongs to
        id - the id of the XML document, within the site
        document - the document to update in the index
        Returns:
        a success string
        Throws:
        SearchException

      • updateDocument

        String updateDocument(String site,
                    String id,
                    File document,
                    String documentXmlDescriptor)
                      throws SearchException
        Updates the search engine's index data of a structured document (PDF, Word, Office).
        Parameters:
        site - the Crafter site name the content belongs to
        id - the id of the XML document, within the site
        document - the document to update in the index
        documentXmlDescriptor - the descriptor with additional metadata for document to update in the index
        Returns:
        a success string
        Throws:
        SearchException
